subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Question on how fast the bands should sweep
author: Marlboro63@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1207846077
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Kay,
 
The am will sweep a little slower which is normal.  But isn't it nice  
without all the clicking?  And the fm sweep is great on that unit.  I  have had 
awesome results with mine and wish you lots of luck with yours.
 
Jeff
 
 
In a message dated 4/10/2008 11:22:34 A.M. Central Daylight Time,  
psfponies@... writes:

 
 
 
I went ahead and opened up my 12-820 RS radio and clipped the mute 
wire  it is set up simular to the old 12-470 with wires instead of 
pins. It  sweeps both bands fine. Is there any certain rate the band 
should be  sweeping. I noticed that the FM band sweeps faster then the 
AM  band.

Kay
